did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, manuscripts, financial reports, and office files

did.abstract: Correspondence, personal and professional papers, subject file, and other materials of a Cornell professor; includes research data, manuscripts, financial reports, and office files.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, personal and professional papers, subject file, and other materials of a Cornell professor; includes research data, manuscripts, financial reports, and office files.
